explanation: [0-0] A person in a Spider-Man costume has their back to the camera, the zipper not yet pulled up. A tattooed hand wearing a bracelet is helping him zip up. The background is a yellow sandy beach.

[0-3] The video begins with this hand slowly pulling the zipper, all the way to the top of the head, but the slider is also pulled off. The tattooed man is holding the slider. As the camera pans up, you can see the scene in the distance. Many tourists are on the beach, in front of them is a stroller with many items on it.

[0-3] The video begins with this hand slowly pulling the zipper, all the way to the top of the head, but the slider is also pulled off. The tattooed man is holding the slider. As the camera pans up, you can see the scene in the distance. Many tourists are on the beach, in front of them is a stroller with many items on it.

[0-3] The video begins with this hand slowly pulling the zipper, all the way to the top of the head, but the slider is also pulled off. The tattooed man is holding the slider. As the camera pans up, you can see the scene in the distance. Many tourists are on the beach, in front of them is a stroller with many items on it.

[3-9] Spider-Man stands up, walks to the stroller, and pushes it. As the camera lifts, you can see the blue sky and white clouds in the distance, the hills covered with green plants, and modern buildings. A shirtless man wearing a black hat reaches out from the right side and takes the slider, looks at Spider-Man, and waves the slider in his hand.

[9-15] The camera moves to Spider-Man, who is pushing a cart with various goods on it. Behind him is a man in a red shirt, white pants, and slippers, carrying a backpack. The man with the backpack pats Spider-Man on the shoulder, prompting him to look in the direction of the camera. After seeing the slider in the man's hand, Spider-Man touches the clothes on his head. Suddenly, Spider-Man starts to pull hard on the clothes on his head, and the man with the backpack tries to dissuade him. At this time, an elderly man wearing a hat and glasses pushes a cart past Spider-Man and looks at him.
